We are about to generate your very own p: We staan ​​op het punt om uw eigen wachtwoordzin te genereren
This keeps your account secure, and lets: Dit houdt uw account veilig en zorgt ervoor dat u uw portemonnee op meerdere apparaten kunt openen.
It is very important you write this down: Het is erg belangrijk om dit op te schrijven.
Uw wachtwoordzin zal niet meer worden weergeven.
Without it you will lose access to your: Zonder deze zin verlies je de toegang tot je portemonnee.
I have written down or otherwise securel: Ik heb mijn wachtwoordzin opgeschreven of anderszins veilig opgeslagen.

PIN must be a 4-digit number: Je pincode moet een 4-cijferig getal zijn

Een gedeelte van uw geld is tijdelijk niet beschikbaar. Om deze transactie te versturen, moet u eerst wachten totdat de nog niet bevestigde transacties bevestigd zijn.
It seems like you are trying to empty yo: Het lijkt erop dat u een portemonnee probeert leeg te maken. Als men rekening houdt met de transactiekosten, schatten we dat het maximale bedrag dat u kunt versturen %(sendableBalance)s is. We hebben deze waarde voor u ingesteld.
You do not have enough funds in your wal: U hebt niet genoeg geld in uw portemonnee (incl. fee)
A name is required to set your profile o: Een naam is vereist om uw profiel in te stellen op Coin
Unable to retrieve your location: We kunnen uw locatie niet vaststellen
Without a name, the payer would not be a: Zonder een naam kan de betaler u niet identificeren op Mecto.
name: naam
Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is: Gravatar (wereldwijd erkende avatar) is een service waarmee u opnieuw gebruik kunt maken van dezelfde avatar op websites en apps door middel van het opgeven van een e-mailadres.
Mecto lets you broadcast your wallet add: Mecto zorgt ervoor dat u uw portemonnee adres naar andere nabijgelegen Coin gebruikers kunt versturen. Dit gebeurt door GPS-gegevens te vergelijken. Deze gegevens worden verwijderd zodra u Mecto uitschakeld.
Before you start using Mecto, you need t: Voordat u Mecto kunt gebruiken moet u een naam opgeven waarmee anderen u kunnen identificeren.
Exchange rate unavailable for the select: Wisselkoers niet beschikbaar voor de geselecteerde valuta
No Coin users found nearby: Geen Coin gebruikers in de buurt gevonden
Searching your area for other Coin users: Bezig met het doorzoeken van uw gebied voor andere Coin gebruikers
Your transaction will appear in your his: Uw transactie zal binnenkort verschijnen in uw geschiedenis tab.
Please describe what happened above. Bel: Please describe what happened above. Below are network error logs that could help us identify your issue.
Sorry, Coin Wallet kon niet worden geladen.
Try updating your browser, or switching: Probeer uw browser bij te werken, of schakel de private browsing mode uit. Als niets lukt, download dan Chrome voor uw apparaat.
Allow for payments with OpenAlias addres: Voor betalingen met OpenAlias adressen toestaan. Alleen ondersteunde portefeuilles.

Return address should be an address cont: Return address should be an address controlled by you where deposit will be returned in the event of a failed transaction.

This will transfer all coins from the pa: This will transfer all coins from the paper wallet address to your wallet.
This private key has no coins for transf: This private key has no coins for transfer.
Your private keys are keys to your funds: Your private keys are keys to your funds so DO NOT SHARE them with anyone unless you'd like them to have access to your funds.
Your wallet has no private keys with coi: Your wallet has no private keys with coins for export.
Gas limit is the amount of gas to send w: Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction. Increasing this number will not get your transaction confirmed faster. Sending ETH is equal 21000. Sending Tokens is equal around 200000.
Please enter Gas Limit greater than zero: Please enter Gas Limit above zero
You do not have enough Ethereum funds to: You do not have enough Ethereum funds to pay transaction fee (%(ethereumRequired)s ETH).
Please enter an address other than your: Please enter an address other than your wallet address
Please enter a private key other than yo: Please enter a private key other than your wallet private key
It seems like you are trying to empty yo: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee and minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s) into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
Your wallet isn't activated. To activate: Your wallet isn't activated. To activate it please send greater than minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s) to your wallet address.
Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You: Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You can send only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.
An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer tha: An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer that identifies a reason for payment or a non-Ripple account.
A 256-bit hash that can be used to ident: A 256-bit hash that can be used to identify a particular payment.
Please enter a valid invoice ID: Please enter a valid invoice ID
Please enter a valid destination tag: Please enter a valid destination tag
Exchange is currently unavailable for th: Exchange is currently unavailable for this pair
The memo contains optional extra informa: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 28-bytes long.
Your wallet isn't activated. You can rec: Your wallet isn't activated. You can receive only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.
Ad Free Subscription is a recurring subs: Ad Free Subscription is a recurring subscription. You will automatically be billed the amount listed above through iTunes. Your subscription will auto-renew unless you cancel or turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The subscription fee will be charged every year. You can manage your subscription in iTunes.
Your ShapeShift account is not verified.
The EOS account name must be exactly 12-: The EOS account name must be exactly 12-character long and consist of lower case letters and digits from 1 to 5.
This account name is already taken, plea: This account name is already taken, please choose another one.
To create a new account you need to make: To create a new account you need to make an EOS transfer (amount greater than %(minAmount)s) with the following data from an exchange or other EOS wallet.
Account has been successfully set up: Account has been successfully set up
The memo contains optional extra informa: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 256-bytes long.
It seems like you are trying to empty yo: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
Transaction has been expired. Please try: Transaction has been expired. Please try again.
Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Ple: Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more CPU.
Account NET usage has been exceeded. Ple: Account NET usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more NET.
The extra amount will be deposited to th: The extra amount will be deposited to the created account.
